description.translate: The day of the moon smiles	to the most ambitious.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Lundi\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le jour de la lune sourit aux\"}","{\"text\":\"§7plus ambitieux.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The day of the moon smiles\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to the most ambitious.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a2 §7DAR§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§c-2\"}"],color:2964371}}
